taskDescription: Drag and drop the aspects of uncertainty to the correct sentences below.
textField:
Uncertainty due to randomness is *aleatory* uncertainty.
Measurement uncertainty is an important *source* of uncertainty when analysing seized drug samples.
Uncertainty about the colour of fibres recovered from an item of clothing is an example of *direct* level uncertainty.
The *magnitude* of uncertainty describes how uncertain we are.
The likelihood ratio is used to *communicate* uncertainty.
resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
